price: Diles: "Si junto a Dios hubiera otros dioses, como dicen [los idólatras], ellos buscarían acercarse al Señor del Trono [para complacerlo]".
arabic: قُل لَّوۡ كَانَ مَعَهُۥٓ ءَالِهَةٞ كَمَا يَقُولُونَ إِذٗا لَّٱبۡتَغَوۡاْ إِلَىٰ ذِي ٱلۡعَرۡشِ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qul law kāna maʿahu ālihatun kamā yaqūlūna idhan la-ib'taghaw ilā dhī al-ʿarshi sabīlan
